text: The Ministry of Security is a public body in charge of planning national internal security policies and managing and coordinating federal forces. It was created by decree of the Executive Power of the Nation on December 10, 2010, after separating from the Ministry of Justice. It is currently directed by Patricia Bullrich. The ministry is in charge of the Argentine Federal Police, the Airport Security Police, the Federal Council for Internal Security, the Argentine Naval Prefecture and the Argentine National Gendarmerie. ==References== Category:Government ministries of Argentina
title: Ministry of Security (Argentina)
